entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI with Blazor in a separate library -> 404 on static files #15779
  • CollectionView.SelectionChanged gets fired if a CollectionView.SwipeView is added to ItemTemplate [ANDROID] #15778
  • Compiling a simple, basic, barebones Maui Xaml file (App.xaml.cs located in Platform -> Windows folder) that uses a minimal custom IMarkupExtension Fails to Compile, giving the Error, XamlCompiler error WMC0015: Cannot assign 'StringResourceXamlMarkupExtension' into property 'Text', type must be assignable to 'String' #15775
  • Getting runtime exceptions when defining a Thickness in a resource dictionary in XAML, only on release configuration. #15774
  • Rotation property of Border inside a Border is not working on Windows. #15772
    Backlog
  • Android binding project error on build step class-parse: Unable to read file #15771
  • Error in shell flyout #15770
    Backlog
  • Layout for TabbedPage in Modal doesn't update correctly when resizing on Windows #15768
    Backlog
  • FlyoutPage IsPresented does not work when user opens flyout by clicking on hamburger #15767
    Backlog

Closed

  • [iOS] Entry in Border - strange corner round. #11152
    Backlog
  • MAUI tooling and Visual Studio Mac: csproj <ApplicationId> does not update CFBundleIdentifier in `platform/ios/Info.plist` #15781
  • Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Platform error #8509
    .NET 8 Planning
  • PlatformStringSizeService issues #12476
    Backlog
  • Nested Button View In A Frame Causes Crash #15391
  • Template team feedback #35867 #15720
  • Project report issue #15736
  • Black screen upon starting debug. #15467
  • Using x:static in App.xaml located in Platform -> Windows folder causes build to fail with, XamlCompiler error WMC0001: Unknown type 'Static' in XML namespace 'http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml' #15509
  • Release 7.0.86 refers non-existing packages #15392
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppMyRecipesNew_NewRecipe_ScreenReader: Not able to adjust the slider value when Voiceover is turned on. #15320
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [WinUI] Silent crash when updating binding at runtime while thumb scrolling #8247
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Sync aar file with latest java changes #15780
  • Update DEVELOPMENT.md #15777
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [release/7.0.2xx] Bump GitInfo #15776
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [CI] Move away from template parameters to help moving to a matrix strategy. #15761
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Android x nuget bumps #15746
    area/platform

Updated

  • Formalize virtual layout concepts and fix iOS memory leaks #15303
    area/layout 🔲
  • [CI] Remove template explosion on the maui templates build tests. #15365
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [uitests] Run Control gallery tests with cake on iOS and Android #15657
    do-not-merge, area/testing
  • Fix issues with ScrollView on ios that does not correctly resize when… #15460
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • Don't double-inset Border strokes #15458
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [net8.0] Use darc for packs from runtime #15731
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨
  • Add basic Android automated accessibility testing #11097
    area/testing
  • Use base Width and Height on Android PlatformGraphicsView #15721
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • Windows Device tests for CI #15629
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, area/testing
  • [iOS] Handle focus changes for UIButton #10614
    area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [X] Optimize OnPlatform element syntax #5611
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 Planning
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures
  • [Android] Fix Button issue updating background brush type #15725
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [net7.0] Fix incorrect calculation of expansion size when *s have different scalars #15737
    area/layout 🔲
  • IsNullOrEmpty for Paint not returning true if Colors are not set #15668
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • Publish ControlGallery to run tests #15194
    area/testing
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
